title: Welcome
opening_paragraph: Welcome to Epimetheus. It is a frontend for your test results.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.opening_paragraph: Items that are on short-term roadmap:

terminology.title: Terminology
terminology.opening_paragraph: We understand terminology can be daunting in tech world. Core terms used in this project are:
terminology.series: Series/branch: Test runs that have close relation to each other. For example tests that are run in the same source control branch. Can be set in TestArchiver.
terminology.suite: Suite: Collection of individual cases. For example 4 tests that test login form with different cases. Specified in test files.
terminology.test: Test: Individual test case. For example test that tries the login form with valid user. Specified in test files.
terminology.team: Team: Specifies the project in multiple project setup. Can be set in TestArchiver. Default is "No team".

testarchiver.description: : Tool that saves test result data from xml files to database.

chage_engine.description: : Tool that uses test result history stored in database to calculate which tests should run against certain code

icons.title: Icons
icons.opening_paragraph: Icons to indicate test status use blue and red coloring combined with helping shapes. If you have trouble viewing the results, please create an accessibility issue in the repository. Our goal is to make this project accessible for everyone.
icons.not_found: Test not found in selected run

views.title: Different Views
views.history: History: Shows how the recent test runs have executed. Amount of visible runs can be 5-30 (default 10).
views.team: Team: Display all series related to a single team.
views.suite: Suite: Collection of different test cases. Open different test cases and see related results, log messages and metadata.

feedback.title: How to give feedback?
feedback.text: Feedback can be given using GitHub issues or with
